CustomField.description: BO-873: In order to create a consolidated report on activities on both Leads and Contacts with certain conditions on this information
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(WhoId), FALSE, IF( LEFT(WhoId, 3) = '00Q', /* WhoId is Lead */ Lead__r.Industry_ICP__c, Contact__r.Account.Industry_ICP__c ) )
CustomField.label: Industry ICP
